title: Why are Chinese so unapologetic and toxic?
body:
At the risk of sounding racist AF - but I swear it's gotten to a point where it's like saying African Americans are the best ballers. Sure, there are plenty that are bad/mediocre, but all elite ballers have always been African Americans. My statement is: while there are plenty of decent Chinese players, the most toxic players I meet tend to be Chinese, and I just go, "Oh, this ol' chestnut."

It must be the one-child policy that's led to little emperor/empress syndrome?

The moment they face any adversary in-game or they feed, they become so fucking toxic. Had an Ahri feed 4 straight, and apparently it was Caitlyn's fault? She died in laning phase four times solo.

Then proceeds just be a complete prat the rest of the game.

Was not at all surprised to see him typing in Chinese in post-game lobby.

replies.body: I'm also sick to death of the constant SB, every single game there is always that one person that likes to spam it.
Yeah, yeah, I wrote this knowing that I'd sound racist AF. I'm not though, I assure you.
